post.author: Brendan(김성욱)

comment.author: 김성욱
comment.content: 에궁 칭찬해주셔서 감사합니다. 그래도 참석해주셔서 제가 더 감사하네요...

post.content:
Thank you - the first session attendants.
As I said, the second session will be held on the 30th, Saturday morning. It will be the same starting time, but not the same place maybe. I will inform you in private as soon as it is decided.
Belows are the topics for the day.
- XLink - XPointer - XMLSchema - DOM
* You should not print out the file I gave you because I modified some pages, so I will prepare them like before.
* Newly updated PDF file will be delivered to everyone before the session.
* Review of 'XSL' is recommended. It'll make it easier to follow up every concept or example that'll be discussed.
Happy XML! See you.
post.title: XML basic seminar Part II
